snippet: Digital technology has overwhelmed many of those who sought to master it. Brian Lam was both a prince and casualty of it, David Carr writes in his Media Equation column.
abstract: Digital technology has overwhelmed many of those who sought to master it. Brian Lam was both a prince and casualty of it, David Carr writes in his Media Equation column.
lead_paragraph: Digital technology has overwhelmed many of those who sought to master it. Brian Lam was both a prince and casualty of it, David Carr writes in his Media Equation column. Read more »

headline.main: The Media Equation: Brian Lam’s Wild Web Ride
